/** Colors */
/** Font variables */
/** Mixins */
.node--type-press-release.node--view-mode-teaser-labeled { border: 1px solid #C2D1D9; border-radius: 0.2rem; height: 100%; padding: 1.5rem; min-height: 165px; }

.node--type-press-release.node--view-mode-teaser-labeled a, .node--type-press-release.node--view-mode-teaser-labeled a:active { color: #767676; }

.node--type-press-release.node--view-mode-teaser-labeled a:hover, .node--type-press-release.node--view-mode-teaser-labeled a:focus, .node--type-press-release.node--view-mode-teaser-labeled a:active:hover, .node--type-press-release.node--view-mode-teaser-labeled a:active:focus { text-decoration: none; }

.node--type-press-release.node--view-mode-teaser-labeled a:hover h5, .node--type-press-release.node--view-mode-teaser-labeled a:focus h5, .node--type-press-release.node--view-mode-teaser-labeled a:active:hover h5, .node--type-press-release.node--view-mode-teaser-labeled a:active:focus h5 { text-decoration: underline; }

.node--type-press-release.node--view-mode-teaser-labeled .node__title { margin: 0; }

.node--type-press-release.node--view-mode-teaser-labeled .label { font-family: 'Merriweather Bold'; font-weight: 700; color: #767676; font-size: 0.6875rem; }

.node--type-press-release.node--view-mode-teaser-labeled h5 { font-family: 'Merriweather Bold'; font-weight: 700; color: #212121; font-size: 0.9375rem; }

.node--type-press-release.node--view-mode-teaser-labeled .node__content { font-family: 'Lato'; font-weight: 400; color: #767676; font-size: 0.8125rem; }

.node--type-press-release.node--view-mode-teaser-labeled .node__content .field--name-field-docdate { font-family: 'Lato Bold'; font-weight: 700; color: #767676; font-size: 0.625rem; letter-spacing: 0.1em; text-transform: uppercase; }

@media (min-width: 576px) { .node--type-press-release.node--view-mode-teaser-labeled { min-height: 337px; }
  .node--type-press-release.node--view-mode-teaser-labeled .label { color: #767676; font-size: 0.75rem; }
  .node--type-press-release.node--view-mode-teaser-labeled h5 { color: #111212; font-size: 1rem; margin: 0; }
  .node--type-press-release.node--view-mode-teaser-labeled .node__content { font-size: 0.875rem; } }
